title: Issue #7 - September 12, 2011
header: Let's see how creative are the people reading this newsletter? My earlier attempts to tweet about the newsletter got 4-12 retweets. What if I asked you to just click on this link, edit the text and send out the tweet? What would you add to the end of the text?

entries.title: Parrot is a foundering project on top of a wonderful vision.
entries.text: Christoph Otto took off the gloves and started to describe how he wants Parrot and more importantly the Parrot development process should change. This is a link to the opening message on the parrot-dev mailing list.
